title: Flash Point: Fire Rescue
notes: Three Action Tiles replaced with blue chits I drew stick people on.
curation_notes:
1 doublesided board, 6 firefighters, 6 player colour cards, 1 d6, 1 d8, 33 threat tokens (fire/smoke), 15 place of Interest tokens (5 blank, 10 victims, additional tokens are spares), 24 black damage cubes, 8 door tokens (extras are spares), 24 hotspot tokens (small flames), 21 action tokens (green), 3 heal tokens, 6 hazmat tokens, 2 vehicle tokens, 8 specialist cards, reference cards.

The d8 MUST have opposing sides add up to 9. If yours doesn’t, you must tell players that “flip the die” means turn it to the side that adds to 9.

curation_notes:
STANDARD CARD GAME (GRAY) SLEEVES

Components:
58 cards, divided as follows:

5 each of 4 treasures
3 Waters Rise!
3 Helicopter Lift

The Earth Stone
The Statue of the Wind
The Crystal of Fire
The Ocean’s Chalice

Notes:
The Water Meter board wears quickly due to the Water Level slider, this is generally the first thing to go, keep an eye on it.  The Lions (Statue of the Wind) base is removable and can be lost by guests.
